advancements.hallownest.root.title: Hallownest Expansion
advancements.hallownest.root.description: Higher beings, these words are for you alone
item.hallownest.old_nail.tooltip_1: A traditional weapon of Hallownest. Its blade is blunt with age and wear.
item.hallownest.old_nail.tooltip_2: Get above enemies to bounce off of them.
item.hallownest.sharp_nail.tooltip_1: A traditional weapon of Hallownest, restored to lethal form.
item.hallownest.sharp_nail.tooltip_2: Get above enemies to bounce off of them.
item.hallownest.channel_nail.tooltip_1: A cleft weapon of Hallownest. The blade is exquisitly balanced.
item.hallownest.channel_nail.tooltip_2: Get above enemies to bounce off of them.
item.hallownest.coil_nail.tooltip_1: A powerful weapon of Hallownest, refined beyond all others.
item.hallownest.coil_nail.tooltip_2: Get above enemies to bounce off of them.
item.hallownest.pure_nail.tooltip_1: The ultimate weapon of Hallownest. Crafted to perfection, this ancient nail reveals its true form.
item.hallownest.pure_nail.tooltip_2: Get above enemies to bounce off of them.
item.hallownest.dream_nail.tooltip_1: Allows the wielder to cut through the veil between dreams and waking.
item.hallownest.dream_nail.tooltip_2: Allows the user to enter a mind.
item.hallownest.pale_ore.tooltip_1: Rare, pale metal that emanates an icy chill.
item.hallownest.pale_ore.tooltip_2: Prized by those who craft weapons.
item.hallownest.crystal_heart.tooltip_1: The energy core of an old mining golem, fashioned around a potent crystal.
item.hallownest.crystal_heart.tooltip_2: The crystal's energy can be channeled with a Mothwing Cloak to launch the bearer forward at dangerous speeds.
item.hallownest.mask_shard.tooltip_1: A shard of an ancient mask, worn to protect oneself from harm.
item.hallownest.mask_shard.tooltip_2: Collect more to strengthen your shell and gain mysterious abilities.
item.hallownest.ancient_mask.tooltip: A complete mask. When whole, a mask protects its wearer, shielding the true form beneath.
item.hallownest.geo.tooltip: The currency of Hallownest, made from fossilised shells of various forms.
item.hallownest.mothwing_cloak.tooltip_2: Allows the wearer to dash forwards along the ground or through the air.
item.hallownest.crystal_cloak.tooltip_1: Cloak threaded with mothwing strands, imbued with a Crystal Heart.
item.hallownest.crystal_cloak.tooltip_2: Allows, the wearer to channel the crystal's energy and dash forwards for multiple distances along the ground.
item.hallownest.shade_cloak.tooltip_1: Cloak formed from the substance of the Abyss.
item.hallownest.shade_cloak.tooltip_2: Allows the wearer to dash through enemies and their attacks without taking damage.
item.hallownest.monarch wings.tooltip_1: Wings of ethereal matter that shimmer in the darkness.
item.hallownest.monarch wings.tooltip_2: Allows one to jump again in mid-air.
